alert.note: Alert for Columbia (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 9:23PM EDT until March 26 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Columbia County in east central Georgia... Edgefield County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Aiken County in central South Carolina... South central Saluda County in central South Carolina... Southeastern McCormick County in central South Carolina... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 923 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Clarks Hill Recreation Area, or 14 miles north of Martinez, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Aiken, North Augusta, Edgefield, Johnston, Ridge Spring, USC Aiken, Clarks Hill Recreation Area, Saluda County Airport, Edgefield County Airport, J. Strom Thurmond Dam, Aiken Municipal Airport, Citizens Park, Graniteville, Gloverville, Trenton, Ward, Strom Thurmond High School, Scott`s Landing, Cleora and Colliers. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 6 and 24. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
